website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch Bluetooth speaker that can be used worry-free during a variety of water-related activities.
pros: Easily connects to any Bluetooth-enabled device up to 33 feet away
Comes with a built-in FM radio
Boasts an intelligent interface that makes it simple to switch between songs and radio stations without delay
Offers suction cups that enable you to attach the speaker to a shower, bath, or other surfaces
cons: Not as powerful as similar Bluetooth speakers

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for a friend and he loves it. Sound is great and waterproofing seems legit. I have a much more expensive speaker but this one was less than half the price with all of the same features plus the ability to answer phone calls. I do pretty thorough research on reviews and features before buying on Amazon, and this one seemed to cover all of the bases.
customer_reviews.author: AGonzales7

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Partner
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Got this shower bluetooth speaker to replace a different model which failed after a short time. This unit blows the old one away. Sound quality and available volume is far superior. Bass response is nothing short of excellent. You can feel the bass thumps on the shower glass. Half volume is about all I can take. Claims 5 Watts output which seems believable. Bluetooth stays connected and battery life appears adequate. LED lighting is very nice. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: uncajack48

customer_reviews.title: Works great.... for the first few days.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker worked really well for the first few days. It sounded great and it looked awesome. Unfortunately, after not even a week it could only hold a charge for about 20 minutes, and now it will no longer hold a charge at all. I'm really disappointed because for the first few days it was a great speaker. If not for it breaking down in less than a week I would have recommended it. Update: They sent me a replacement that is working wonderfully so far. Hopefully it continues to do so, I will update in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Zoran Lorinc

customer_reviews.title: not a great option for a pool
customer_reviews.text: It floats well. Sufficient connectivity distance. I purchased to use in our pool. Once floating in the water the sound is nearly inaudible until you’re right next to the speaker. The volume loudness is marginal. I have a 32 foot, in length, pool and I can not hear the music at one end when the speaker is sitting on the poolside at the other end. You can not even discerne music is playing if the speaker is floating in the water. If you’re wanting a speaker for the shower, this is a great option. A speaker for your canoe/kayak this is a great option. A floating speaker for a pool party? no.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVEEEE my Bluetooth speaker!!! I immediately opened it and tested out ALL of the really cool features. I was able to answer phone calls and skip any songs I wanted. My phone was in my room charging while I was listening to music on my Bluetooth speaker! I absolutely love that it’s waterproof, I was able to shower and enjoy my favorite. The speaker is a great size and the suction cup is STRONG! I didn’t have to worry about it falling off the shower wall. The colorful lights were an awesome added bonus. Best speaker I have ever purchased, and it didn’t break the bank! 💜
customer_reviews.author: yanela

customer_reviews.title: Little speaker, little price, big sound!
customer_reviews.text: Love this in my shower. Effortlessly pairs up with my phone through Bluetooth and sound is big, bassy and easy to hear over the shower sound. The suction cup doesn't hold onto the glass shower at all, so I wrapped a cord around it and attached it to a hook that goes over the side of the shower. Problem solved. What would be an improvement would be a display for the FM stations numbers, because there is no feedback and it's a guessing game as to how to find the station you want.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi Pup

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Bluetooth, lame for radio
customer_reviews.text: Great for Bluetooth. Really great. Terrible for radio. No way to know what station you’re on. Awful reception, no matter where we are. Stings only because it’s the primary reason I picked THIS speaker. But who listens to the radio besides my phoneless kid anymore?
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Boynton

customer_reviews.title: This is GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It is waterproof, as we found out when it fell into the pool. It floats, and sound is very good for its size. I would definitely recommend this. The only con I have is I don’t believe you can turn off the lights. I don’t have an aux port in my car, and was using this to listen to my music. When it was dark, the constant changing colors became distracting. I still highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: CNP

customer_reviews.title: Nice little speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to learn the volume & I have not had the chance to use in water but it it's a great little speaker for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: 6 hour battery life, sound quality is top notch.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, but love it! LED light is great, 6 hour battery life, sound quality is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. I use it all the time, and the battery is nice. It also announces when the battery is dying or when it pairs. Its a nice speaker that still works even when dropped alot...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, good sound
customer_reviews.text: My kids use this in their bathrooms. Sticks to wall well and puts out pretty good sound.
customer_reviews.author: GaizerOne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: The reception on this is very clear, and when I listen to the radio, I have plenty of stations to listen to. When you first get your product, if you take the time the read what all the buttons mean, then you will quickly get used it it!
customer_reviews.author: Laine Pardue

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This may look cool, but not worth the money. The buttons are hard to read, especially when you’re in the shower. It worked good at first, then you have to start pressing the buttons really hard for it to work and now it doesn’t work and it’s just past the return date. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steph M

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Can’t decline phone calls while listening to speaker. Cool lights
customer_reviews.author: Alan W. Gelman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to change the channel. I returned this item . The sound was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a Beast!
customer_reviews.text: This "little" thing is a Beast! Sound quality was impressive and instructions to use, a breeze. Nevermind the fact that it's resistant to water, the portability and the size are a huge plus. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: rafael olmedo

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Did not last long enough. Charger hook up broke in less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Cockrill

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the Best Waterproof speaker I have ever came across
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the Best Waterproof speaker I have ever came across. It’s super loud and just what I need to wake me it during my morning shower... #Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Yetsenia Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the pool
customer_reviews.text: We gave the speaker as a gift for our friend turning 65. He uses it in his pool and after using it the first time, described it as "the bomb"! It was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Pammy

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC SPEAKER!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME SPEAKER!!! Sound is loud and clear! Very happy! Will buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: It’s cool
customer_reviews.text: This thing is cool.. sounds great and is easy to use
customer_reviews.author: paul merlino

customer_reviews.title: An amazing piece of product for such a cheap price
customer_reviews.text: An amazing piece of product for such a cheap price. Was overwhelmed by the clarity of sound n blue tooth range it has. Deeply recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The product stopped being able to keep a charge. Now I can not exchange it. POS. Do Not buy this item
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Van Keulen

customer_reviews.title: My family absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: My family absolutely love this product. Unfortunately it means my water bill will probably go up, because everyone is taking longer showers. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Fajardo

customer_reviews.title: FM radio tuning does not work. Stays on the same station
customer_reviews.text: About to return this because the FM radio tuning does not work
customer_reviews.author: Craig A Patton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Speaker is small but has a great sound! Totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Has great sound. Blue tooth works great
customer_reviews.text: Has great sound. Blue tooth works great, but FM radio does not work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great sound out of this little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound out of this little speaker. Bought for my jet ski, so won't test it out until it gets warmer but it looks like it'll get a lot of use!
customer_reviews.author: cjdnoble

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to change stations, volume, inputs
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good but no markings on Volume, or inputs or stations, blindly push buttons. My stations no longer change. Easily hooks to Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: michael t.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sounds for the shower
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Speaker for the shower, I love the sound and the battery life is perfect. Waterproof works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a little package and yes it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound in a little package and yes it is water proof! I just wish the buttons had more of a contrast of color to show volume versus pause or on/off.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to listen to FM radio and I can't get a signal from anywhere in my house.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Not sure, just don’t care for it,
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t sound good in the water and can’t find a good channel!
customer_reviews.author: Barb Nolan

customer_reviews.title: looks good and packeged well
customer_reviews.text: looks good and packeged well, but as it is a Christmas gift, I really cannot say if it is a good product or not. I'll get back to you on this after Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: vonnied

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR $ If you want AM/FM capabilities
customer_reviews.text: The AM/FM radio does not work at all on the product - tested in several areas in a 20 mike radius and all you get is static.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Finding the product difficult to use and understand. If ...
customer_reviews.text: Finding the product difficult to use and understand. If the kids can’t use it I will be returning it. Thought I was just purchasing a shower radio.
customer_reviews.author: smm518

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS! horrible product. The “speaker” is quieter than just playing music from your phone. The suction doesn’t work, it fell from my shower about every 4 seconds. And there’s a static sound even during music. I’m disappointed amazon sold this product and allowed this company on their site. Amazon is going downhill because of terrible companies and Products like these.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

product_meta.title: Waterproof Bluetooth Speakers, Portable + Wireless Shower FM Radio That Pairs to All Bluetooth Devices - Phones, Tablets, Computer, Apple Watch - LED Mood Lights, Super HD Sound, Wet it!
product_meta.description: This is a 100% Waterproof, Wireless, Portable, Bluetooth Speaker.... JCT Alliance is dedicated to manufacturing and providing ONLY the BEST products assembled under strict quality control to make sure every product delivered, makes an amazing 1st impression on EVERY customer.
feature_bullets: ❤ JCT Alliance™ carefully created this product to provide our customers with a PORTABLE, WATERPROOF, and BLUETOOTH SPEAKER that can be used WORRY-FREE in ALL water related activities (Shower, Tub, Jacuzzi, Pool, Beach, Lake, Water Park, Kitchen, and even under the rain!

☔ FULLY WATERPROOF: This IPX7 rated speaker floats and can be immersed in up to 3 feet of water for up to 30 minutes, the Suction Cup and Floating ability of this powerful speaker makes it the perfect item to never leave behind, simply put – THE BEST WATERPROOF BLUETOOTH SPEAKER on the market today.

📶 CONNECTIVITY: Easily connect to ANY Bluetooth enabled device from up to 33 feet away, or use the Built-in FM radio to rock to the latest hits. The Intelligent Interface makes it super easy to switch between your favorite tracks, radio stations, YouTube videos, increase / decrease the volume, switch between Bluetooth and Radio mode and even use the built-in microphone to answer calls while temporarily pausing the song being played.
🔊 SIZE: Don't be fooled by the size of this speaker as it delivers 5 Watts of High-performance - room-filled loudness provided by the extra base in the Sub-Woofer.

🎁 GIFT IDEA: Be sure to pick one up for a friend or family member as this Beautiful Speaker is also packaged in the PERFECT BOX to make it a wonderful, affordable, and well protected GIFT to fit any occasion. Don’t settle for anything less and enjoy a worry free purchase with our 365-Day MONEY BACK guarantee!
